original_text: Then he took a loaf of bread and he thanked God for it. He broke the bread into pieces and he gave some of it to each of them. He said, ‘This is my body. I am giving it to save you. When you eat this meal from now on, remember me.’
korean_text: 또 떡을 가져 감사 기도 하시고 떼어 그들에게 주시며 이르시되 이것은 너희를 위하여 주는 내 몸이라 너희가 이를 행하여 나를 기념하라 하시고

sentences.original_text: Then he took a loaf of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 빵 한 덩어리를 가져가

sentences.original_text: and he thanked God for it
He broke the bread into pieces
and he gave some of it to each of them
I am giving it to save you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희를 구원하기 위해 이것을 준다

sentences.original_text: When you eat this meal from now on
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 앞으로 이 식사를 먹을 때
